attributes.additional_details: I want the government to make improvements to the SEN system at all stages of education. Schools are widely reported up and down the UK as NOT to be following what is in place, delaying putting things in place,particularly where there is no diagnosis.Pupils and parents need clear guidelines on what is being done, when and why and when this is to be reviewed. There needs to be someone to support parents to ensure all options are being covered and to show things ARE being done. Many, Many parents are being let down or "fobbed off" by staff in school.
